item.title: Add twitter login with Omniauth + Devise on Rails5
item.description: This post follows previous post How to use Omniauth + Devise on Rails5 from scratch, which is about how to setup facebook login. This post shows how to additionally setup twitter login. You can get APP ID and APP SECRET from here. 1. initial step add omniauth-twitter in Gemfile $ diff --git a/Gemfile b/Gemfile index de3f792..271a916 100644 --- a/Gemfile +++ b/Gemfile @@ -56,3 +56,4 @@ gem 'devise' gem 'omniauth' gem 'omniauth-facebook' gem 'dotenv-rails' +gem 'omniauth-twitter' $ bundle install $ gem list | grep omniauth omniauth (1.
